name: discord
description: Discord is a proprietary freeware VoIP application and digital distribution platform designed for video gaming communities.
installation: curl -L -o discord.tar.gz https://discord.com/api/download?platform=linux&format=tar.gz && sudo tar -xzvf discord.tar.gz -C /opt && sudo ln -sf /opt/Discord/Discord /usr/bin/discord && rm discord.tar.gz
